channel.title: Wish/Dream List *Take A Look*
channel.description:
Hi its Spyder here and i would like to figure out how to make a server and a client with all of this included in it.
**Server** *317 Base *Full following *Prayer Drains *Prayer shows above head *Most of the items work in the client (not glitched) *Every skill works *Lunar, Normal Magic, and Anchint's work (Auto Cast) *Full Pest Control (Dosint really matter to me, but nice) *Full Castle Wars *Veng Skulls *Working Pk levels *Working skulls *Full PvP *All special attack's work *Full fight pits *Fixed beards (Shows when you wear a hood&helmet) *Full High & Low Alching and goes back to magic book after you alch the item.
**Client** *Most item's show (not nulled) (Bandos, 3rd Age, God Swords, Some Armor) *Nice client base that i could or someone could help me fix and call my own.
If you could help me with any of this I'd appreciate it. -Thank You, Spyder.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 12:33:35 am[/size][hr]Im not sure what 317 is but i mean a client with like Clan chat button and such.

item.title: Wish/Dream List *Take A Look*
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

[quote=“Owner Donkie, post:1, topic:241786”]Hi its Spyder here and i would like to figure out how to make a server and a client with all of this included in it.

  **Server**

*317 Base
*Full following
*Prayer Drains
*Prayer shows above head
*Most of the items work in the client (not glitched)
*Every skill works
*Lunar, Normal Magic, and Anchint’s work (Auto Cast)
*Full Pest Control (Dosint really matter to me, but nice)
*Full Castle Wars
*Veng Skulls
*Working Pk levels
*Working skulls
*Full PvP
*All special attack’s work
*Full fight pits
*Fixed beards (Shows when you wear a hood&helmet)
*Full High & Low Alching and goes back to magic book after you alch the item.

     **Client**

*Most item’s show (not nulled) (Bandos, 3rd Age, God Swords, Some Armor)
*Nice client base that i could or someone could help me fix and call my own.

                                    If you could help me with any of this I'd appreciate it. 
                                                   -Thank You,   Spyder.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 12:33:35 am[/size][hr]Im not sure what 317 is but i mean a client with like Clan chat button and such.[/quote]most of that has already been done tbh,its called epacsatled, the word is backwards.

Read full topic
